lead_paragraph: Kurt Busch won his second consecutive road course pole yesterday, wheeling his Dodge through the 11-turn Watkins Glen course at 122.966 miles an hour to knock Kasey Kahne (121.845 m.p.h.) to second for tomorrow’s AMD at the Glen Nascar Nextel Cup event in upstate New York. Ryan Newman qualified third, and the four-time Watkins Glen winner Jeff Gordon was fourth.
